content:
@jenlampton would you be willing to make a bug fix release for nodequeue? There are a couple fixes. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/nodequeue/issues/35

Undefined view in contextual links info for core views 路 Issue #35 路 backdrop-contrib/nodequeue
Running Backdrop 1.17.0 and Nodequeue 2.3.0, I'm getting undefined index errors from several core views like user_admin Notice: Undefined index: view in nodequeue_contextual_links_view_alter() ...
